items.name: ExtrinsicCount
items.docs: Total extrinsics count for the current block.

items.name: AllExtrinsicsWeight
items.docs: Total weight for all extrinsics put together, for the current block.

items.name: AllExtrinsicsLen
items.docs: Total length (in bytes) for all extrinsics put together, for the current block.

items.name: BlockHash
items.docs: Map of block numbers to block hashes.

items.name: ExtrinsicData
items.docs: Extrinsics data for the current block (maps an extrinsic's index to its data).

items.name: Number
items.docs: The current block number being processed. Set by `execute_block`.

items.name: ExtrinsicsRoot
items.docs: Extrinsics root of the current block, also part of the block header.

items.name: Digest
items.docs: Digest of the current block, also part of the block header.

items.name: Events
items.docs: Events deposited for the current block.

items.name: EventCount
items.docs: The number of events in the `Events<T>` list.

items.name: EventTopics
items.docs:
Mapping between a topic (represented by T::Hash) and a vector of indexes
 of events in the `<Events<T>>` list.

 All topic vectors have deterministic storage locations depending on the topic. This
 allows light-clients to leverage the changes trie storage tracking mechanism and
 in case of changes fetch the list of events of interest.

 The value has the type `(T::BlockNumber, EventIndex)` because if we used only just
 the `EventIndex` then in case if the topic has the same contents on the next block
 no notification will be triggered thus the event might be lost.
